oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Camel Rock & Roll Dance Party - 1956-04-21 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: CBS Rock 'N' Roll Dance Party program sponsored by Camel cigarettes, 1956-04-21 part 1. Hosted by Alan Freed with announcer Roy Rowan, starring Count Basie and his Orchestra with vocalist Joe Williams, and special guest stars Faye Adams, and the Robins. Produced and directed by Lou Melamed.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Count Basie Orchestra; Faye Adams; Robins; Joe Williams
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Alan Freed) -- Opening theme -- Opening statement (Roy Rowan) -- Alan Freed introduces Count Basie and his Orchestra -- Blee Blop Blues (Count Basie Orchestra) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial (Alan Freed) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Alan Freed introduces Faye Adams -- Shake A Hand (Faye Adams) -- Alan Freed introduces the Robins -- Cherry Lips (Robins) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial (Alan Freed) -- Alan Freed and Count Basie talk -- Wailin' (Count Basie Orchestra) -- Alan Freed introduces Joe Williams -- Alright, Okay, You Win (Joe Williams, Count Basie Orchestra)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: CBS Inc.; R.J. Reynolds Tobacco Company; Camel rock 'n roll dance party (Radio program); Freed, Alan; Rowan, Roy; Basie, Count, 1904-1984; Count Basie Orchestra; Williams, Joe, 1918-1999; Adams, Faye; Robins (Musical group); Melamed, Louis
